function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Compatibility issues with 6G devices and sensors","Impact":"Incompatible devices leading to fragmentation and inefficiency","Mitigation":"Drafting unified frameworks and standardized protocols","Technologies":"Unified framework standards","People":"Manufacturers, technology companies","Owner":"Technology standardization organizations"},{"Description":"Unprecedented energy consumption and high cost of energy-efficient devices","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and high cost of energy-efficient devices","Mitigation":"Development of energy-efficient devices and charging methods","Technologies":"Energy-efficient device technology, alternative charging methods","People":"Consumers, manufacturers","Owner":"Device manufacturers, energy companies"},{"Description":"Cost of implementing 6G technology","Impact":"Obstacle to technology adoption and implementation","Mitigation":"Further research on tentative costs, exploration of compatibility issues and transitions","Technologies":"Cost estimation tools, compatibility testing technology","People":"Policy makers, technology companies","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies"},{"Description":"Ethical and moral issues related to 6G technology","Impact":"Potential deterrent to technology adoption and application","Mitigation":"In-depth research and understanding of ethical implications","Technologies":"Ethical evaluation frameworks","People":"Policy makers, ethicists","Owner":"Ethics research institutions"}]}
